UCL 增强学习课程 – David Silver

课程网站课件+视频 Lecture 1: Introduction to Reinforcement Learning Lecture 2: Markov Decision Processes Lecture 3: Planning by Dynamic Programming Lecture 4: Model-Free Prediction Lecture 5: Model-Free Control Lecture 6: Value Function Approximation Lecture 7: Policy Gradient Methods Lecture 8: Integrating Learning and Planning Lecture 9: Exploration and Exploitation Lecture 10: Case Study: RL in Classic Games
